snippet: Film companies are poised to release an extraordinary cluster of prominent movies by and about black Americans, across an array of genres and including several awards contenders.
abstract: Film companies are poised to release extraordinary cluster of prominent movies by and about black Americans in last five months of 2013; black filmmakers attribute 2013 wave of releases in large part to creativity that has flourished on independent-film circuit.
lead_paragraph: Film companies are poised to release an extraordinary cluster of prominent movies by and about black Americans, across an array of genres and including several awards contenders.

headline.seo: Coming Soon: A Breakout for Black Filmmakers
headline.main: Coming Soon: A Breakout Year for Black Films
headline.print_headline: Coming Soon: A Breakout Year for Black Films
